en.start.hello: 👋 Hey! I'm a Fortnite PvE bot to automatically get and manually replace daily quests! My commands: 🌎 /lang — change quests language 🕹 /quest — your quest list 📊 /stats — your bot stats ⚡️ /status — your server load 📬 /support — if something broke
en.lang.detect: Your language: {}? The quests will be displayed in it.
en.incorrect.auth.code:
Hey, if you write auth-code is incorrect (only 32 symbols), your msg size: {}! Please try again.

I don't handle messages other than auth-code!
en.error.not.auth: ❗ Please click /start your user_id deleted from auth.json
en.error.already.auth: ❗ You already auth! Don't send any message!
en.auth.correct: 👌 Good, your code is 32 symbols! Trying to authorize..
en.click.button:
Click /quest to update ♻️
👇 Click a button to replace 1 quest:
en.req.quests.wait: ⏳ Requesting a list of quests, waiting..
en.already.replaced: 🎉 You've already replaced quests today. See you tomorrow! Click /quest to update ♻️
en.support.contact: 📬 Error? Is something broken? Text me about it, we'll be sure to fix it. Contact: @drnvbot // or my Github
en.second.start: Attention! Don't use the bot if isn't yours! Your account can be hacked! Only for personal use! 💡Run your own version of the bot: https://github.com/zdky/questreroll
